text: The Outlaw's Revenge is a 1915 silent American biographical drama film, directed by Christy Cabanne. It stars Raoul Walsh, Irene Hunt, and Teddy Sampson, and was released on April 15, 1915. ==Cast list== * Raoul Walsh as the outlaw * Irene Hunt as the outlaw's elder sister * Teddy Sampson as the outlaw's younger sister * Mae Marsh an American lover * Robert Harron an American lover * Eagle Eye as the outlaw's servant * Walter Long as federal officer * William E. "Babe" Lawrence as federal officer * Spottiswoode Aitken as federal officer ==References== ==External links== * * Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American drama films Category:1915 drama films Category:1915 films
title: The Outlaw's Revenge
